Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I made a small VTOL, it can carry 2 crew members, and it can fly for a long time. Not sure how long, but its just fun to play around with. It is also very maneuverable, and easy to fly. Here's a preview of it. (Download Is Below)![QvuQ7or.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/QvuQ7or.png?1)![hIfCTrP.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/hIfCTrP.png?1)![nZ8GBBH.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/nZ8GBBH.png?1)

DOWNLOAD

=======

[http://www./download/j3dcdr3trn3r9cl/Mini+VTOL.craft](http://www./download/j3dcdr3trn3r9cl/Mini+VTOL.craft)

Enjoy ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-09T08:01:10Z" title="05/09/2015 08:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 9, 2015</time> by technicalfool**

That reminds me of those Korean War choppers.
